turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Hi, thanks for calling Reliable Home Services. What can I help you with today?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: I need someone to look at my air conditioning. It's making a weird noise.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: No worries, I'll get you through to our booking team for that HVAC service.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Hi there! I can help you book an HVAC technician. Can I start with your name?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Thanks David. And your phone number?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Got it. I've noted HVAC service. What date works for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: Actually, hold on. How much does an HVAC call-out cost?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Our HVAC call-out fee is ninety-nine dollars, and total service typically ranges from one fifty to five hundred depending on the job. Would you like to go ahead and book?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: I need to check with my partner first. I'll call back.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: No worries at all, David. We're here whenever you're ready. Have a good day!
